roleset.name: give incorrect information

example.name: misinform-v
example.text: They will make every attempt to misinform and misrepresent themselves .

example.name: misinformation-n
example.text: A difference was taken when the first writ abates by default of the demandant himself, as by his misinformation of the tenant's name

example.name: arg1
example.text: Awesome . I heard target also delivered something . Or am I misinformed ?

roleset.note: MISINFORM-V NOTES: Added by Julia for ETW
MISINFORMATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for ETW
MISINFORMED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. Relation to 'inform.01'. (from misinformed.01-j)
